name: ai-project-generator
description: Universal AI Project Generator with Real-time Progress

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: JSDevUno
